pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Shoes plus socks

Safety_Information.general_Info: CAUTION. Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with eyes or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling, and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco, or using the toilet. Remove and wash contaminated clothing before reuse.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15 - 20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first five minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: If pesticide gets on skin, wash immediately with soap and water.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: For medical emergencies, call the poison control center at 1-800-222-1222. For general information on this product contact the National Pesticides Information Center at 1-800-858-7378 or at http://npic.orst.edu.
